bio:
He is currently traveling on the road. He is ethnically an Imperial. He is usually on horseback, and accompanied by one or two Imperial Legion soldiers serving as his bodyguard(s). His attire matches his status and consists of expensive fine clothing.
If approached by other travelers, he acts rude and easily annoyed. If attacked he will flee rather than fight, despite carrying a high-quality dagger.
Example dialogue:
"I have nothing to say to you. Now move along, or I'll order my guards to attack."
If not currently accompanied by a bodyguard: "Keep away. If I am harmed, people will come looking."
name: Noble
